name: cotton bowl cozy
sizes_available: 7 x 7 inch square, with 5.5 inch diameter circle
notes:
this cotton bowl cozy is made with cotton yarn and uses only single crochet making it very beginner-friendly. 
stop burning your hands when eating soup and use this cozy to protect your hands when transporting and eating the soup, stew or even chili in a bowl.
